slider.description: A Slider component for displaying current value and intervals in range.
slider.basic_desc: Basic slider. When range is true, display as dual thumb mode. Use disabled to make slider interactivity disabled.
slider.icon_desc: You can add an icon beside the slider to make it meaningful.
slider.event_desc: The onChange callback is fired when the user changes the slider's value. The onChangeComplete callback is fired when mouseup or keyup is fired.
slider.mark_desc: Using marks property to mark a graduated slider, use value or ClosedRange to specify the position of thumb. When included is false, means that different thumbs are coordinative. When step is nil, user can only slide the thumbs onto marks.
slider.reverse_desc: Set reverse to true to reverse the component.
slider.api.value_desc: The value of slider. When range is false, use Double, otherwise, use ClosedRange<Double>.
slider.api.min_desc: The minimum value the slider can slide to.
slider.api.max_desc: The maximum value the slider can slide to.
slider.api.step_desc: The granularity the slider can step through values. Must be greater than 0, and be divisible by (max - min). When step is nil and marks exist, valid points will only be marks.
slider.api.disabled_desc: If true, the slider will not be interactive.
slider.api.vertical_desc: If true, the slider will be vertical.
slider.api.marks_desc: Tick marks of Slider. The type of key must be Double, and must be in closed interval [min, max].
slider.api.dots_desc: Whether the thumb can only be dragged to tick marks.
slider.api.included_desc: Takes effect when marks is not nil. True means containment and false means coordinative.
slider.api.draggableTrack_desc: Whether the range slider track is draggable (move the range as a whole). Only works for range slider.
slider.api.onChange_desc: Callback function that is fired when the user changes the slider's value.
slider.api.onChangeComplete_desc: Fire when mouseup or keyup is fired.
slider.api.onChangeComplete_hint: Callback is triggered when dragging ends.
slider.token.handleLineWidthHover_desc: Border width of handle when hover.
slider.token.railHoverBg_desc: Background color of rail when hover.
slider.token.trackHoverBg_desc: Background color of track when hover.
slider.token.trackBgDisabled_desc: Background color of track when disabled.
slider.token.handleActiveColor_desc: Border color of handle when active.
slider.token.dotActiveBorderColor_desc: Border color of dot when active.
slider.token.global.controlHeightLG: Height of large control, affects controlSize
slider.token.global.colorPrimaryBorder: Primary border color, affects trackBg and handleColor
